item.title: Chaotic Model Help. rep ++ for help
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Had this problem before, After days of downloading diffrents chaotic models etc i find out that the Ints witch u past in class8 are way to big…

Like : class8.anInt174 = 35084; class8.anInt165 = 35085; class8.anInt200 = 35085;

Should be : class8.anInt174 = 9955; class8.anInt165 = 9956; class8.anInt200 = 9956;

If you changed that for all. then change the model name also… So the model can not be named 13000 when the class8.anInt165 = 9956; is 9956… THen the model should be named 9956 to.

Hope u understand…
Youridudock

If you dont understand i can help you trough msn. youridudock@hotmail.com I still got the Models and Ints that work from my client… Only im not home so i dont got acces to them now ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Chaotic Model Help. rep ++ for help

item.title: Chaotic Model Help. rep ++ for help
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Okay My Client Crashes When i Spawn My Chaotics.
This is What my ints are can someone Help me out on fixing this?

Heres my ints

if(i == 13787) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 35084; class8.anInt165 = 35085; class8.anInt200 = 35085; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 1400; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 1300; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Chaotic rapier"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A weapon of amazing speed.".getBytes(); class8.aByte205 = -11; class8.aByte154 = -11; } if(i == 13788) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 35086; class8.anInt165 = 35087; class8.anInt200 = 35087; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 1300; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 1300; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Chaotic longsword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A weapon of incredible accuracy.".getBytes(); class8.aByte205 = -11; class8.aByte154 = -11; } if(i == 13789) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.aByte205 = -10; class8.aByte154 = -10; class8.anInt174 = 35088; class8.anInt181 = 1360; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 354; class8.anInt169 = 4; class8.anInt194 = 2; class8.anInt165 = 35089; class8.anInt200 = 35089; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Chaotic maul"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A weapon of brute strength.".getBytes(); }
any thing wrong?

heres the error

Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsEx at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Su at Class8.method201(Class8.java:6460) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:6297) at client.method105(client.java:9198) at client.method36(client.java:1740) at client.method102(client.java:8753) at client.method9(client.java:9958) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:121) at client.run(client.java:5012) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Anyone No whats wrong?
